name: Butterfly Javascript Game
tagline: A butterfly adventure -very basic- game made with javascript (and game development videos)
body:
### How to make a video game
A web series (game dev tutorial videos) to teach people how to make a 2D web based game with Javascript, html, css (in Turkish)

* Play game; https://goo.gl/Fr2EUR
* Download source; https://goo.gl/F5QmUO
* Project page; http://goo.gl/g2XTWx

![2D game development](http://bug7a.github.io/butterfly-javascript-game/preview.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
